title: Bernie Sanders hits 4 million donations mark, campaign announces
subtitle: Bernie Sanders hits 4 million donations mark, campaign announces
content: Sanders – like his progressive rival Sen. Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts – is relying on small-dollar grassroots donations to fuel his campaign. He hauled in $25.3 million in the July-September third quarter of fundraising, more than any other Democratic White House hopeful. That haul was powered by some 1.4 million contributions.
